title: Why nocturne wan't in the remake list?
body: Riot said this patch is for assassins, {{champion:56}}  is assassin, but too bad, you're not on the list {{champion:56}}. What is he Riot, A tank? A Mage?? AD carry???

replies.body: He's an assassin that didn't need a rework. Is that allowed?
Noc been pretty useless since devourer died.

Riot actually specifically said nocturne wouldn't be part of this update because they feel he's more of a fighter/diver champion. They prefer to think of assasins as a champion which can kill a squishy, and then get out. With Nocturne it's more like 'Dive into the enemy team and fight until your dead or their dead.'
Moreso a tank now, since he is outdmged by virtually everyone (Assassin wise), also he is not in need of rework, because he still can have impact, unlike old yorick for example
